function_call.name: eval_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":["Coronavirus settling for a longer time period on surfaces at lower temperatures and in conditions of low and high relative humidity","Covid-19 lasting for several days on certain materials such as plastics, ceramics, silicone rubber, glass, and stainless steel","Potential movement of antimicrobial materials into the natural environment and sewage system","Airborne transmission of infectious diseases via indoor air","Lack of adequate quarantine facilities and isolation spaces within housing environments","Increased demand for larger homes and outdoor spaces may lead to overcrowding and reduced physical distancing, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and accumulation of airborne pathogens","Inadequate air filtration technology contributing to indoor air pollution","Unclear effectiveness of air purification technology","Dependence on air conditioning systems for thermal comfort","Inadequate review of construction, design, and maintenance of hvac systems","Inadequate ventilation and air supply in buildings","Insufficient ventilation rates for controlling infection probability","Potential airborne transmission of sars-cov-2 in indoor environments due to inadequate ventilation and overcrowding","Risks associated with prolonged exposure to uv lights and negative ionizers"]}
